definition.name: Calendar
definition.purpose: Display a customizable calendar UI for date selection
definition.description: A reusable calendar component built on top of react-day-picker, supporting custom styling, navigation icons, and range selection. It is designed to be used wherever a date or date range picker is needed in the UI.

className.description: Additional CSS classes to apply to the root calendar container.

classNames.description: Custom class names for various calendar subcomponents.

showOutsideDays.description: Whether to show days from the previous/next month in the calendar grid.

initial.data: Calendar displays the current month with navigation and selectable days.

visible: Calendar grid for the current month
Day cells styled according to state (selected, today, outside, etc.)

when.description: User clicks the previous or next month navigation button

visible: Calendar grid for the new month

effects: Calendar updates to show the selected month

when.description: User clicks on a day cell

from.state: No day selected or a day is already selected

effects: Selected day is highlighted and value is updated

when.description: User selects a range of days (if in range mode)

from.state: No range or partial range selected

effects: Selected range is highlighted and value is updated

definition.visualLayout: A card-like calendar with navigation arrows, grid of days, and custom styling for selected, today, and range states.
definition.implementationNotes: Wraps react-day-picker with custom class names and navigation icons using lucide-react icons. Accepts all DayPicker props and passes them through.
